attributes.action: Prepare the UK for the collapse of the Euro
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon the government to take such measures as it sees fit to prepare for a possible collapse of the Euro and any ill-effects that may have on our economy.
Furthermore, other areas of immediate concern would be a plan to deal with the mass Influx of EU citizens that would emigrate to the UK as a result of such an eventuality as well as assistance to British Nationals resident in other EU countries that might require assistance or repatriation.
